topic.title: Is it possible to run a wordpress or some sort of blog platform on ZeroNet?
topic.body: I was wondering if it was possible to run some sort of blogging platform on ZeroNet

1600897212_1PwWwS85gsGDcbKXYUqgD1HchDXiN.body:
> [styromaniac](#comment_2557_16NS3rBdW9zpLmLSQoD8nLTtNVsRFtVBhd): ZeroBlog and its forks...

I wanted something a little more capable

> [styromaniac](#comment_2559_16NS3rBdW9zpLmLSQoD8nLTtNVsRFtVBhd): If you ask, someone might implement the features you want.

Thats good to know, but I think I can live with zeroblog
